view_strings.welcome_text:
Welcome to SalaryAdministrationGui -personnel management application!
The employees can be created, modified and deleted in the editor on the left side. The created employees will appear on the right side as a last where you may use the following the following actions:
Single click -> Select Employee Double click -> Loads Employee on the left form for editing
The application will automatically save and load the employee data that is displayed on the application window.
To create and load your own backups of the employees, you may use the File -menu. For examples, try selecting File->Load from application menu.
